item.description:
Henry's Wine Cellar announced last week that it is not going to have tastings on Thursdays until the spring. I called them and they said they'd do one for us if we want to buy the wine first.  I don't want to try to organize that, so let's just meet for dinner at Not Your Average Joe's -- they have a big parking lot - which seems easier in the ice and snow - fewer snowbanks to ford...

 I have made reservations for 7:30pm at NYAJ's -- they have been very accommodating in the past with a pretty big group.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Important: Dinner in Beverly 7:30pm - no wine tasting!!
